short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for quick hashing and validation of Files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hash your file with MD5, SHA1, SHA256, straight from your browser. No need to look up how to hash files from your console. Provides an easy way to validate recent downloads with accessibility in mind.
